attributes.action: Cancel all vocational exams taking place in January until it’s safe
attributes.additional_details: STOP TRYING TO COP-OUT BY TELLING SCHOOLS ITS UP TO THEM BE A LEADER AND CANCEL ALL VOCATIONAL EXAMS
attributes.background: Pupils taking vocational exams are expected to go into schools where it’s unsafe for them and their families as schools act as vectors of transition ( in pm Boris Johnson’s words )  cancelling all vocational exams until it’s safe to do so is the best and only option
